### Schedule Trigger  
Automatically runs every morning at 8AM (modifiable).  
This node initiates the workflow by fetching real-time market data and crypto news for AI analysis.  
Adjust timing to align with your preferred report cadence (e.g., 12H or weekly).

### CoinGecko API ‚Äî Market Overview  
Fetches live market data for top coins (BTC, ETH, SOL, etc.) using CoinGecko‚Äôs public API.

- Price (USD), Market Cap, 24H % Change, Volume  
- Ranking & Symbol metadata  
This forms the quantitative foundation of the AI summary.  
No authentication required.

### NewsAPI ‚Äî Latest Crypto Headlines  
Retrieves the most recent crypto-related news articles.  
Includes: title, URL, source, and publishedAt fields.

### Data Merger  
Combines outputs from CoinGecko, NewsAPI, and CryptoPanic into one unified dataset.  
Ensures synchronized market metrics and sentiment for AI analysis.  
Acts as the bridge between raw data collection and structured AI input.

### Market Data Formatter  
Normalizes all incoming data into a standardized schema:
- coin_name, price_usd, pct_change_24h, sentiment_score, and news_summary

## Automated Crypto Market Summaries to Discord using Gemini AI & CoinGecko

### Try It Out!  
Automate professional-grade crypto market reports directly in Discord.  
This workflow analyzes live prices, sentiment, and news to produce actionable daily summaries via Gemini AI.

### How It Works  
1. Triggers daily at 8AM.  
2. Fetches market data (CoinGecko) + headlines (NewsAPI).  
3. Merges and formats clean dataset.  
4. AI Agent (Gemini) creates a market summary + sentiment report.  
5. Final message is formatted and posted to Discord.

### How to Use  
- Configure your CoinGecko & NewsAPI credentials.  
- Set preferred coins or keywords.  
- Enter your Discord Webhook or Bot Token.  
- Adjust the trigger time to fit your timezone.

### (Optional) Extend This Workflow  
- Add CoinMarketCap or Binance API for extended metrics.  
- Append Twitter API node for trending mentions.  
- Use Google Sheets or Notion node to archive daily summaries.

### Requirements  
- Google Gemini API key  
- NewsAPI key  
- Discord Bot or Webhook URL  

### Summary  
A fully automated, AI-powered Discord summary system delivering crypto intelligence, top movers, and market context every day ‚Äî hands-free.
